name: NBAFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Follow the latest news and game recaps from around the NBA within Alexa's Flash Briefing. After enabling the skill, say things like "Alexa, what's my flash briefing?" Or, "Alexa, what's in the news" to hear your flash briefings. Go to Settings in your Alexa app and find "Flash Briefing" to move NBA Flash Briefing to the top of your news brief.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
